bibl.title: Alexander the Great kosmokrator.
Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011.

bibl.note: In all probability the idea of Alexander the Great kosmokrator became enshrined in the original early Ptolemaic core story of Alexander and Nectanebo.
bibl.seg: Krzysztof Nawotka & Agnieszka Wojciechowska, Alexander the Great kosmokrator.

Volker Grieb, Krzysztof Nawotka & Agnieszka Wojciechowska (edd.), Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011 = Philippika. Altertumskundliche Abhandlungen. 74 (Wiesbaden, 2014) pp. 145-151.
In all probability the idea of Alexander the Great kosmokrator became enshrined in the original early Ptolemaic core story of Alexander and Nectanebo.
